titles.title: A resolution commending and congratulating the Northern Arizona University Lumberjacks Men's Cross Country Team for winning the 2022 National Collegiate Athletic Association Cross Country National Championship.

A resolution commending and congratulating the Northern Arizona University Lumberjacks Men's Cross Country Team for winning the 2022 National Collegiate Athletic Association Cross Country National Championship.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Star Print ordered on the referred resolution.
Star Print ordered on the agreed to resolution.

bill.summary: This resolution honors the Northern Arizona University Lumberjacks men's cross country team for winning the 2022 National Collegiate Athletic Association men's cross country national championship.
